briefTitle: Complementary and Alternative Medicine on Mental Health in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Effects of Complementary and Alternative Medicine on Mental Health in Breast Cancer Patients and Their Family Caregivers
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

- All adult woman with breast cancer diagnoses and their primary family caregiver

Exclusion Criteria:

* Insufficient physical capacity
* Severe mental disorder
* Inability ti give informed consent
